title: Total Transparency Unleashed
story_summary: Secret Council recordings and BCI files are leaked across Stenograd. Outraged citizens confront leaders and demand change. Halden's final message calls for forgiveness. The city votes in a tense referendum to decide whether to erase old scores or start over. Stenograd's future hangs in the balance.

official.headline: Unified Response
official.anchor_line: Citizens gather calmly as Stenograd reviews recent system transitions.
official.contextual_reframing: Public participation demonstrates Stenograd's commitment to order and collective progress.

official.headline: District Discussions
official.anchor_line: Neighborhood assemblies open for community input on future governance.
official.contextual_reframing: These structured forums reflect a mature society adapting seamlessly to new circumstances.

official.headline: New Consensus
official.anchor_line: A transparent referendum on BCI reform concludes, advancing the value of collective forgiveness.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd enters a renewed era of unity and progress through considered, collaborative decision-making.

underground.headline: Secrets On Screen
underground.anchor_line: Every hidden meeting and dirty secret spills out across Stenograd.
underground.contextual_reframing: They called it stability. We call it surveillance, lies, and now exposure. The truth is public, ready or not.

underground.headline: Reckoning Begins
underground.anchor_line: Neighborhoods erupt as citizens confront the officials who watched and scored them.
underground.contextual_reframing: Assemblies are no longer silent. People want answers, want justice. The system finally faces its public.

underground.headline: System On Trial
underground.anchor_line: Halden's own last plea goes public  -  forgive or dismantle, the vote is in our hands now.
underground.contextual_reframing: Amnesty isn't a gift from on high. It's a demand from below. Stenograd chooses what comes next  -  for real this time.
